title: (x) "Le Bar" typesetting request
content: How about having someone (me, for example) make an image in whatever size you need and send it to you in PDF ? I have DeVinne, but I do not trade fonts, as licenses don't allow that. You can e-mail me if you are interested, and for this one time I will not charge you for this service.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
Ah, was I too slow in replying to your post? I have already set up the letters in 240 pt type and saved it as PDF. No matter.   
   
However, you really did the right thing, and it's a classic typeface.
